metadata.name: Automatic Night Light
metadata.description: Light-sensing circuit that automatically turns on an LED when ambient light levels drop below a threshold.

wires.description: Wire from Pico 3.3V to breadboard 5D. Provides power to photoresistor voltage divider.
Wire from Pico ADC0 to breadboard 8C. Reads voltage from photoresistor divider to detect light levels.
Wire from Pico ground to breadboard 13C. Completes voltage divider ground connection.
Wire from Pico GPIO15 to breadboard 18D. Controls LED on/off based on light sensor reading.
Wire from Pico ground to breadboard 22C. Completes LED circuit ground connection.
